document_title: What is myasthenia gravis? Causes, symptoms, prevention
subsection_name: benh-nhuoc-co.json_8_Diet and lifestyle for people with myasthenia gravis
subsection_content: Scientific diet: Patients should supplement the body with adequate nutrients, especially fruits and vegetables. Among them, bananas and papayas are fruits that contain abundant amounts of potassium, helping muscles function better.; Exercise: You should build and maintain exercise habits to improve your physical health and develop muscle health.; Always keep a relaxed spirit, avoid excessive stress and anxiety for long periods of time.
subsection_title: benh nhuoc co.json. Diet and lifestyle for people with myasthenia gravis
subsection_data:
benh nhuoc co.json. Diet and lifestyle for people with myasthenia gravis
Scientific diet: Patients should supplement the body with adequate nutrients, especially fruits and vegetables. Among them, bananas and papayas are fruits that contain abundant amounts of potassium, helping muscles function better.; Exercise: You should build and maintain exercise habits to improve your physical health and develop muscle health.; Always keep a relaxed spirit, avoid excessive stress and anxiety for long periods of time.
